name: LaserCombat
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: laser combat
des:
Face adversaries with your laser gun and shield following these simple rules:

- You can fire your laser gun but remember to reload it first.
- You can only reload the gun once
- You can activate the shield to protect against adversary's laser.

All your opponents will follow the same rules.

It's a simple game but if you enjoy a bit please give it some stars.

If you have any suggestions, find an error or want to share a comment, let us know: alexa@procodedsolutions.com

Thanks a lot!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
